sqlUnit.name: select_menu_tree
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.parent_id,t.sort_order,t.id as menuId,t.parent_id as parentId,t.name from t_n_menu t order by t.sort_order asc

sqlUnit.name: select_dict_tree
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.parent_id,t.sort_order,t.id as dictId,t.parent_id as parentId,t.busi_name from t_n_dict t order by t.sort_order asc

sqlUnit.name: select_org_tree
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.parent_id,t.sort_order,t.id as orgId,t.parent_id as parentId,t.name from t_n_org t order by t.sort_order asc

sqlUnit.name: role_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.state and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='DATA_STATE')) as state ,t.descr,u.full_name,t.create_time from t_n_role t,t_n_user u where t.user_id = u.id [ and t.id in (:roleIds)] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: role_simp_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.descr from t_n_role t where t.state = '1' [ and t.id in (:roleIds)] [and t.name like '%:name%'] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: role_user_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.username,t.full_name,t.mobile_no,o.seq_names from t_n_user t,t_n_org o,t_n_role_user ru where t.state = '1' and t.org_id=o.id and ru.role_id=:id and ru.user_id=t.id [and (t.full_name like '%:name%' or t.username like '%:name%' or t.mobile_no='%:name%')] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: role_adduser_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.username,t.full_name,t.mobile_no,o.seq_names from t_n_user t,t_n_org o where t.state = '1' and t.org_id=o.id and t.id not in (select ru.user_id from t_n_role_user ru where ru.role_id=:id) [and (t.full_name like '%:name%' or t.username like '%:name%' or t.mobile_no='%:name%')] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: role_org_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.seq_names,(select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.type and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='ORG_TYPE')) as type,t.code from t_n_org t,t_n_role_org ro where t.id=ro.org_id and ro.role_id=:id and ro.flag='role' [and (t.name like '%:name%' or t.code like '%:name%')] order by t.sort_order asc

sqlUnit.name: role_addorg_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.seq_names,(select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.type and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='ORG_TYPE')) as type,t.code from t_n_org t where t.id not in (select ro.org_id from t_n_role_org ro where ro.role_id=:id and ro.flag='role') [and (t.name like '%:name%' or t.code like '%:name%')] order by t.seq_names asc

sqlUnit.name: role_position_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.seq_name from t_n_position t,t_n_role_position rp where t.id=rp.position_id and rp.role_id=:id [and t.name like '%:name%'] order by t.seq_name asc

sqlUnit.name: role_addposition_list
org_mgr_tree_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.parent_id,t.sort_order,t.id as orgId,t.name,t.code, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.type and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='ORG_TYPE')) as type, t.sort_order as sortOrder,t.contacts,t.contact_number from t_n_org t order by t.sort_order asc

sqlUnit.name: position_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,o.name as orgName,t.create_time from t_n_position t,t_n_org o where t.org_id = o.id [and t.org_id=:orgId] [and t.org_id in(:orgIds)] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: select_position
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name from t_n_position t [where t.org_id=:orgId] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: user_simp_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.username,t.full_name,o.seq_names from t_n_user t,t_n_org o where t.state = '1' and t.org_id=o.id [and t.org_id in(:orgIds)] [and (t.full_name like '%:name%' or t.username like '%:name%')] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: user_role_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.descr from t_n_role t,t_n_role_user ru where t.state = '1' and ru.user_id=:id and ru.role_id=t.id [and t.name like '%:name%'] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: user_addrole_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.descr from t_n_role t where t.state = '1' and t.id not in (select ru.role_id from t_n_role_user ru where ru.user_id=:id) [and t.name like '%:name%'] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: org_role_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.descr from t_n_role t,t_n_role_org ro where t.state = '1' and t.id=ro.role_id and ro.org_id=:id and ro.flag='org' [and t.name like '%:name%'] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: org_addrole_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.descr from t_n_role t where t.state = '1' and t.id not in (select ro.role_id from t_n_role_org ro where ro.org_id=:id and ro.flag='org') [and t.name like '%:name%'] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: position_role_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.descr from t_n_role t,t_n_role_position rp where t.state = '1' and t.id=rp.role_id and rp.position_id=:id [and t.name like '%:name%'] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: position_simp_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,o.seq_names from t_n_position t,t_n_org o where t.org_id=o.id [and t.name like '%:name%'] [ and t.org_id in(:orgIds)] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: position_addrole_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.descr from t_n_role t where t.state = '1' and t.id not in (select rp.role_id from t_n_role_position rp where rp.position_id=:id) [and t.name like '%:name%'] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: select_role_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name from t_n_role t [ where t.name like '%:name%'] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: select_res_list_by_menu
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name from t_n_resource t where t.id not in(select m.resource_id from t_n_menu m where [ m.resource_id <>:id and ] m.resource_id is not null) [ and t.name like '%:name%'] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: minwin_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.uri,t.more_uri,t.height,(select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.is_show_title and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='VISIBLE_STATE')) as isShowTitle, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.state and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='DATA_STATE')) as state ,t.sort_order,t.create_time from t_n_min_window t order by t.sort_order asc

sqlUnit.name: version_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select v.id,v.version_,v.update_date,v.create_time,v.descr from t_n_version v where v.type_='pc' [ and v.version_ like '%:version%'] order by v.create_time desc
